title: Jordan
subtitle: Discover Petra, the Dead Sea, and more
short_description: Explore the magical country of Jordan on this six-day adventure. See fascinating highlights such as Amman, Jerash, Petra, Wadi Rum, and the Dead Sea. This package includes guided sightseeing and activities, all accommodations, ground transportation and airport transfers, some meals, a 4x4 Jeep safari tour, and site admission fees.
